amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 118-280 to add a Sense of Congress that the Iranian regime should receive no additional funds but that basic humanitarian assistance for the people of Iran is important.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cherfilus-McCormick amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cherfilus-McCormick amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cherfilus-McCormick amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
